generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the image, bordered by a curb and where pedestrians are walking, is a sidewalk.
- building: Several multi-story structures with windows and architectural details are visible in the background and to the sides.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible throughout the image, especially along the streets and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing as a light blue or white area.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A white van is prominently visible in the middle of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white bicycle symbol is visible on a pole on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including the one holding the traffic light and the one with the traffic sign.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible in the background and along the sidewalk.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the left side of the image, near the center of the road.
